General.Name: Avgol Industries 1953 Ltd
General.Description: Avgol Industries 1953 Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and markets nonwoven fabrics for manufacturers of baby diapers, adult incontinence, and feminine hygiene products worldwide. The company also manufactures and sells fabrics for use in the manufacture of masks, robes, and personal protective equipment. Its fabric is used as a raw material for various industries, such as agriculture, furniture and upholstery, disposable clothing, disposable fabrics, construction, filtration products, and others. The company offers its products under the Avgol, Avsoft, Avsilk, and Avspun brands. Avgol Industries 1953 Ltd was incorporated in 1953 and is headquartered in Petah Tikva, Israel. Avgol Industries 1953 Ltd is a subsidiary of Indorama Ventures Spain S.L.
